sentences.sentence: It listed two blogs by name, Al Rojo Vivo and blog del Narco.
sentences.translation: 它列出了两个博客的名字，Al Rojo Vivo和Blog del Narco。

sentences.sentence: Dating from the end of the 19th century, Japan began to be engaged in the narco-trafficking in Fujian.
sentences.translation: 早在十九世纪末，日本就开始在福建从事贩毒活动。

sentences.sentence: The following is an interesting story of how King turns out to be the No. 1 "narco" dog in New York City.
sentences.translation: 下面一则有趣的故事讲的是金如何成为纽约第一缉毒犬。
